Summary: STARLIKE OBJECT WITH FLASHING RED,BLUE GREEN,YELLOW AND WHITE LIGHTS
divs: Sighting DetailsTHIS IS THE SECOND TIME I HAVE REPORTED SIGHTING THIS OBJECT AND TONIGHT WAS THE MOST DRAMATIC VIEW IVE HAD.WHILE SITTING ON MY FRONT PORCH I SAW TWO OF THESE OBJECTS AT DIFFERENT POINTS IN THE SKY BUT THEY APPEARED TO BE AT THE SAME ALTITUDE.AFTER WATCHING THESE FOR A WHILE (30 MINS)I WENT INSIDE AND WHEN I RETURNED I SAW A THIRD MUCH LOWER AND BETWEEN THE FIRST TWO.THIS OBJECT WAS MUCH BRIGHTER,LIKE VENUS EXCEPT FOR THE CLEARLY VISIBLE FLASHING MULTICOLORED LIGHTS.I WATCHED ALL THREE WITH MUCH INTEREST DETERMINED TO SEE IF THEY CHANGED POSITION DRASTICALLY OR ANYTHING AND MY FRIENDS SON CAME OUTSIDE AND CALLED ME.AT THIS TIME I TURNED AROUND FOR MAYBE TWO SECONDS AND WHEN I TURNED BACK AROUND THE THIRD MUCH BRIGHTER OBJECT HAD VANISHED AND WAS NOWHERE TO BE SEEN.SURELY MORE PEOPLE HAVE SEEN THIS.WAS MUCH DISAPPOINTED NOT TO SEE HOW IT LEFT OR WHERE IT WENT.I HAVE NEVER BEEN MORE CONVINCED THAT SOMETHINGS OUT THERE THAN I AM RIGHT NOW.THE OBJECTS WERE IN THE SKY WEST OF HERE AND APPEARED TO BE ABOUT 2000 FEET UP AND MAYBE 30 MILES AWAY ALTHOUGH ITS HARD TO SAY FOR SURE.THESE THINGS APPEAR TO BE VERY INTERESTED IN THIS AREA.ONCE AGAIN IF ANYONE ELSE IN THE AREA HAS OBSERVED THESE PLEASE EMAIL ME AT gilawildman@yahoo.com.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Seminole
There were no other sightings in Seminole on or around September 25th 2008
